lead_paragraph: An e-mail and bulletin warned about rape in a remote Congolese area much earlier than officials originally said.

keywords.value: Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda

headline.main: U.N. E-Mail Shows Early Warning of Congo Rapes

headline.print_headline: U.N. Documents Told of Rapes in Congo

byline.original: By JOSH KRON and JEFFREY GETTLEMAN
byline.contributor: Josh Kron reported from Goma and Jeffrey Gettleman from Nairobi, Kenya
